VVMTools Class#

vvmtools.VVMTools#

alias of VVMTools

Attributes#

vvmtools.VVMTools.VARTYPE

  • VARTYPE: Dictionary of variable types

  • DIM: Dictionary of spatial dimensions

  • INIT: Dictionary of initial profile data

  • time_array_str: Array of time values
